description: Two-candle bearish reversal pattern where a large red candle completely engulfs the previous green candle's body. Signals shift from buying to selling pressure.
validationRules: Second candle body completely covers first candle body
Second candle opens above first candle close
Second candle closes below first candle open
Pattern forms after uptrend or at resistance
invalidationSignals: Second candle fails to fully engulf first candle
Pattern forms in middle of downtrend (not reversal)
commonMistakes: Entering without waiting for confirmation candle
Not checking if wicks are engulfed (bodies are what matter)
Trading every engulfing pattern - context is key
Not placing stop above engulfing candle high

tradeSetup.entry: Below engulfing candle low or on rally
tradeSetup.target: Nearest support or risk-reward based target

supportive: High volume on engulfing candle (2x+ average)
